Description

TLC Match for the WWE World Heavyweight Championship: Sheamus (c) defeated Roman Reigns. The League of Nations interfered, allowing Sheamus to win the match. After the match, Reigns violently attacked the League with a chair. Triple H tried to intervene, so Reigns attacked him as well. He put HHH through a table with an elbow and speared him.

Ric Flair cheated for Charlotte to prevent Paige from winning. Charlotte retained after sending Paige into an exposed turnbuckle.
